comet.agent.core.dialogue_manager package¶

Submodules¶

comet.agent.core.dialogue_manager.dialogue_manager module¶

The DialogueManager consists of a dialogue state tracker and a policy. It handles the decision-making part of the Conversational Agent. Given new input (a list of DialogueActs), it will ensure that the state is updated properly and will output a list of DialogueActs in response, after querying its policy.

db_lookup(tracker)[source]¶

Perform an Neo4j or json query given the current dialogue state (i.e. given which slots have values).

Returns(tuple): a tuple of dictionary containing the current database results and slot entropies

Consult the current policy to generate a response.

Returns: List of DialogueAct representing the system’s output.
